keyPolicies.policyDescription: Secured Â£18 million from the Government to deliver improvements to junctions along the A614.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Extension of the Robin Hood Line
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Deliver the extension of the Robin Hood Line to Ollerton and Edwinstowe. The North of Sherwood needs to be connected to Nottingham.
Invest in roads and local infrastructure to make sure local residents throughout Sherwood have the best quality of life possible.
Continuing to work with Ofsted to ensure that schools in Sherwood are the best standard they can be.
Continue to support local business owners and the hard work they do in Sherwood.
The Conservatives have already begun hiring 20,000 more police officers. Will make sure Sherwood sees its fair share of officers, out on the streets keeping families safe.

images.caption: Mark Spencer with background showing industrial setting.
